TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {27872=Monitor legislation related to ethanol and biofuels, including the Dual Fuel Vehicle Act of 2011 (S. 152), the Ethanol Tax Credit Repeal Act (S. 520), the Biofuels Market Expansion Act of 2011 (S. 187), the Securing America's Future with Energy and Sustainable Technologies (SAFEST) Act (S. 559), the Ethanol Subsidy and Tariff Repeal Act (S. 871), the Domestic Energy Promotion Act of 2011 (S. 884), the Remove Incentives for Producing Ethanol Act of 2011 (H.R. 426), and the Open Fuel Standard Act (H.R. 1687)., 42866=Monitor impact of U.S. sanctions on Iran and legislation related to antitrust action against OPEC, including the No Oil Producing & Exporting Cartels Act (S. 394), the Iran, North Korea, and Syria Sanctions Consolidation Act of 2011 (S.1048), and the Oil Consumer Protection Act (H.R. 1899). Monitor H.R. 1905, the Iran Threat Reduction Act., 1019=Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 (Section 5) - All Filers Are Required to Complete This Page, 25016=Monitor potential derivatives-related modifications to Dodd-Frank Act (Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2009), including H.R. 1573 and the Business Risk Mitigation and Price Stabilization Act of 2011 (H.R. 1610)., 31115=Monitor legislation related to chemical facility security, including the Continuing Chemical Facilities Antiterrorism Security Act of 2011 (S. 473), the Full Implementation of the Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Standards Act (H.R. 908), the Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Security Authorization Act of 2011 (H.R. 901), and the Secure Chemical Facilities Act (S. 709)., 15043=Monitor legislation related to TSCA reform, including the Safe Chemicals Act of 2011 (S. 847)., 17765=Monitor legislation and regulation related to the National Ambient Air Quality Standards (NAAQS), including the Comprehensive Assessment of Regulations on the Economy (CARE) Act (S. 609). Monitor legislation related to oil spill liability, including the Implementing the Recommendations of the BP Oil Spill Commission Act of 2011 (H.R. 501), the Resources for Oil Spill Research and Prevention Act (S. 204), and the Big Oil Bailout Prevention Trust Fund Act of 2011 (S. 215)., 34108=Monitoring legislation and advise client on how it affects them including potential legislation to amend the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund and legislation related to closure of the Chicago River Locks, including the Stop Asian Carp Act of 2011 (S. 471/H.R. 892).}
